verses.name: Jeremiah 2:1
verses.text: Moreover the word of the Lord came to me, saying,

verses.name: Jeremiah 2:2
verses.text: Go and cry in the ears of Jerusalem, saying, Thus saith the Lord; I remember thee, the kindness of thy youth, the love of thine espousals, when thou wentest after me in the wilderness, in a land that was not sown.

verses.name: Jeremiah 2:3
verses.text: Israel was holiness unto the Lord, and the firstfruits of his increase: all that devour him shall offend; evil shall come upon them, saith the Lord.

verses.name: Jeremiah 2:4
verses.text: Hear ye the word of the Lord, O house of Jacob, and all the families of the house of Israel:
